title: DeFeet PrintMySock lets you create one-off custom printed cycling socks
content:
Longing for some custom socks, but don’t want to order enough for a whole team? The new DeFeet PrintMySock program lets you order as few as one. single. pair. of fully customized socks! Design it yourself, or use their configurator, to go from toe to top with your own artwork. Available for both the Leviator […]

The post DeFeet PrintMySock lets you create one-off custom printed cycling socks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
